info.title: API Gateway Service
info.description: Central entry point for all microservice requests

get.description: Health check endpoint for Docker health checks
API status endpoint - Get information about all available services

post.description: Register a new user
Login user
Logout user
Refresh access token

put.description:
Update current user profile information. You can update:
- **full_name**: Your display name
- **phone_number**: Contact phone number
- **timezone**: Timezone preference (e.g., 'UTC', 'America/New_York')
- **language**: Language code (e.g., 'en', 'hi', 'ta')
- **preferences**: JSON object for user preferences

post.description:
Change the current user's password. Requires:
- **current_password**: Your current password for verification
- **new_password**: Your new password (minimum 8 characters, must be strong)
- **confirm_password**: Confirmation of new password (must match new_password)

Request password reset email.

Initiates a password reset process. The system will:
1. Check if the email exists in the system
2. Generate a secure reset token
3. Send an email with a password reset link containing the token

**Security Note**: The response message is the same whether the email exists or not,
to prevent email enumeration attacks.

**Parameters**:
- **email**: The email address associated with your account

Reset password with token

Completes the password reset process using the token received via email.

**How it works**:
1. User clicks the reset link in their email
2. Link contains a token (in URL or entered manually)
3. User provides: token, new password, and confirmation
4. System validates the token and updates the password

**Parameters**:
- **token**: The password reset token received via email
- **new_password**: Your new password (minimum 8 characters, must be strong)
- **confirm_password**: Confirmation of new password (must match new_password)

**Note**: After successful reset, all existing sessions are invalidated for security.
Create API key

get.description:
Get available OAuth2 authentication providers.

**Response:** List of OAuth2 providers (Google, GitHub, etc.) with configuration

Initiate Google OAuth flow - redirects to Google for authentication.

**Flow:** User is redirected to Google, authenticates, and Google redirects back to callback endpoint.

Handle Google OAuth callback - exchange authorization code for tokens and create/login user.

**Flow:** Google redirects here after user authentication. The service exchanges the code for tokens,
creates or links the user account, and redirects to frontend with JWT tokens.

post.description: OAuth2 callback handler
Assign a role to a user (Admin only)
Remove a role from a user (Admin only)

get.description: Get roles for a user (Admin or self)

Get user details by user ID (Admin only)

Returns user information including:
- userid
- username
- emailid
- phonenumber
- full_name
- is_active
- is_verified
- is_superuser
- created_at
- last_login

Get all permissions from the permissions table (Admin only)

Returns a list of all permissions with:
- id
- name
- resource
- action
- created_at

Get all users (Admin only)

Returns a list of all users with:
- userid
- username
- emailid
- phonenumber

post.description: Transcribe audio to text using ASR service (alias for /inference)
Perform batch ASR inference on audio inputs
Perform batch TTS inference on text inputs

get.description: Get available TTS voices with optional filtering

post.description: Perform speaker diarization inference on one or more audio inputs
Perform language diarization inference on one or more audio files

Perform NMT inference
Perform OCR inference on one or more images

Perform language detection inference

get.description: Get supported languages for language detection

post.description: Fetch metadata for a specific model.

post.description: Fetch metadata for a specific model.

post.description: Fetch metadata for a specific model.

post.description: Fetch metadata for a specific runtime service.
Register a new service entry.

Response Update Service Entry Api V1 Model Management Services Patch

patch.description: Update the health status reported by a service.

schema.title: Response Update Service Health Api V1 Model Management Services  Service Id  Health Patch

post.description: Create a new A/B testing experiment. Requires at least 2 variants with traffic percentages summing to 100.

get.description: List all experiments with optional filters (status, task_type, created_by).

post.description: Select an experiment variant for a given request. Used by services/gateway to determine which variant to route to.

patch.description: Update an experiment. Cannot update variants of a RUNNING experiment.

delete.description: Delete an experiment. Cannot delete a RUNNING experiment. Stop it first.

post.description: Update experiment status by action: start, stop, pause, resume, cancel.

get.description: Get metrics for an A/B experiment by ID. Returns aggregated metrics per variant per day (request_count, success_count, error_count, success_rate, avg_latency_ms, custom_metrics).

post.description: Execute pipeline inference (e.g., Speech-to-Speech translation)
Evaluate a single feature flag. Supports boolean, string, integer, float, and object (dict) flag types.
Evaluate a boolean feature flag. Returns a simple boolean value indicating if the flag is enabled.
Bulk evaluate multiple feature flags. Evaluates all specified flags in parallel and returns results as a dictionary.

get.description: Get feature flag by name from Unleash. Retrieves flag details from Unleash API (cached in Redis).
List feature flags from Unleash. Returns paginated list of feature flags from Unleash (cached in Redis).

post.description: Refresh feature flags cache from Unleash (admin). Invalidates Redis cache and fetches fresh data from Unleash API.

tags.name: Role Management
tags.description: Endpoints for managing user roles and permissions. Admin-only operations for assigning/removing roles and viewing role assignments.

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Authentication and authorization endpoints. Requires authentication headers for protected routes.

tags.name: OAuth2
tags.description: OAuth 2.0 authentication endpoints. Sign in with Google and other OAuth providers.

tags.name: ASR
tags.description: Automatic Speech Recognition service endpoints. Convert audio to text.

tags.name: NMT
tags.description: Neural Machine Translation service endpoints. Translate text between languages.

tags.name: TTS
tags.description: Text-to-Speech service endpoints. Convert text to speech audio.

tags.name: OCR
tags.description: Optical Character Recognition service endpoints. Extract text from images.

tags.name: Transliteration
tags.description: Transliteration service endpoints. Convert text from one script to another.

tags.name: Language Detection
tags.description: Language detection service endpoints. Identify text language and script.

tags.name: Model Management
tags.description: Model catalog management endpoints. Register, update, and list AI models and services.

tags.name: Pipeline
tags.description: Pipeline service endpoints. Execute multi-step AI processing pipelines.

tags.name: Feature Flags
tags.description: Feature flag management endpoints. Evaluate, list, and manage feature flags using Unleash.

tags.name: Status
tags.description: Service status and health check endpoints.
